org.kiji.rest.representations
Class KijiRestEntityId

java.lang.Object
  org.kiji.rest.representations.KijiRestEntityId

public final class KijiRestEntityId
extends Object

Container class for entity ids which can be backed as strings (suitable for raw, hashed, hash-prefixed, and materialization suppressed keys) xor as a list of components (suitable for formatted entity ids without materialization unsuppresed).

Method Detail

create

public static KijiRestEntityId create(String entityId)
                               throws IOException
Create KijiRestEntityId from a string input, which can be a raw hbase rowKey prefixed by 'hbase=' or 'hbase_hex=' (the former for bytes-encoding and the latter for ASCII encoding).

Parameters:
entityId - string of the row.
Returns:
a properly constructed KijiRestEntityId.
Throws:
IOException - if KijiRestEntityId can not be properly constructed.

createFromUrl

public static KijiRestEntityId createFromUrl(String entityId,
                                             org.kiji.schema.layout.KijiTableLayout layout)
                                      throws IOException
Create KijiRestEntityId from a string input, which can be a json string or a raw hbase rowKey. This method is used for entity ids specified from the URL.

Parameters:
entityId - string of the row.
layout - of the table in which the entity id belongs. If null, then long components may not be recognized.
Returns:
a properly constructed KijiRestEntityId.
Throws:
IOException - if KijiRestEntityId can not be properly constructed.

create

public static KijiRestEntityId create(org.kiji.schema.EntityId entityId,
                                      org.kiji.schema.layout.KijiTableLayout layout)
                               throws IOException
Create KijiRestEntityId from entity id and layout.

Parameters:
entityId - of the row.
layout - of the table containing the row.
Returns:
a properly constructed KijiRestEntityId.
Throws:
IOException - if KijiRestEntityId can not be properly constructed.

                               throws IOException
Create KijiRestEntityId from json node.

Parameters:
node - of the RKF2-formatted, materialization unsuppressed row.
Returns:
a properly constructed KijiRestEntityId.

public static KijiRestEntityId create(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node,
                                      org.kiji.schema.avro.RowKeyFormat2 rowKeyFormat2)
                               throws IOException
Create KijiRestEntityId from json node.

Parameters:
node - of the RKF2-formatted, materialization unsuppressed row.
rowKeyFormat2 - of the layout or null if the layout has RowKeyFormat1. If null, then long components may not be recognized.
Returns:
a properly constructed KijiRestEntityId.
Throws:
IOException - if KijiRestEntityId can not be properly constructed.

isWildcarded

public boolean isWildcarded()
Are any of the components wildcarded...

Returns:
true iff at least one component is a wildcard (indicated by a null).

getJsonEntityId

public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode getJsonEntityId()
Gets the json node eid (which can be null if the eid was backed as a string).

Returns:
json node of the eid.

hasComponents

public boolean hasComponents()
If the eid backed by a json or a string?

Returns:

resolve

public org.kiji.schema.EntityId resolve(org.kiji.schema.layout.KijiTableLayout layout)
                                 throws IOException
Construct eid from a entity id string. Formatted entity ids mustn't have wildcards in order to resolve.

Parameters:
layout - of table in which to construct the eid.
Returns:
the eid.
Throws:
IOException - if construction of eid fails due to incorrect user input.
